title: CINNAMON SUGAR PULL APART LOAF
directions: Open biscuit package and cut biscuits into quarters.
In a small bowl, melt the butter.
In a separate small bowl, add the sugar and cinnamon together.
Dip each biscuit piece into butter, and follow up by dipping it into the cinnamon sugar mixture.
Place coated biscuit into a greased, loaf pan.
Once all pieces have been thoroughly coated, place loaf pan into oven.
Bake in a preheated oven, 400, for about 23-26 minutes, or until cooked through.
Remove from oven and flip over onto a plate.
